wikipedia_page.main: Gary Vincent Palmer (born 15 November 1965) played first-class and List A cricket for Somerset from 1982 to 1989. He also played for the England Young Cricketers side in both under-19 Test and One-day International matches. He was born at Taunton, Somerset and is the son of the former Somerset and England Test cricketer Ken Palmer.

response: Johnson made his debut for Durham against Bedfordshire in 1986 Minor Counties Championship.  He played Minor counties cricket for Durham from 1986 to 1988, making 7 Minor Counties Championship appearances and 4 MCCA Knockout Trophy appearances.  He made his only List A appearance against Somerset in the 1988 NatWest Trophy.  He scored 16 runs in this match, before being dismissed by Gary Palmer.
